title: Teen's death under investigation
content:
TIFTON, GA (WALB) - Tifton Police are waiting on autopsy and forensic tests to determine if the shooting death of a 17-year-old was an accident.
Investigators say Vencorral Greene was shot in the chest when he and two other friends were playing with a handgun around noon Saturday at a house on Tift Avenue North.
Investigators will not say who was holding the gun when it discharged until they get autopsy results.
